description.zh: Sonarr 是一个面向 Usenet 和 BitTorrent 用户的个人视频录像工具（PVR），可自动监控 RSS 源以下载、整理和重命名最新的电视剧集，并支持在更高版本出现时自动进行画质升级。
description.en: Sonarr is a PVR (Personal Video Recorder) application designed for Usenet and BitTorrent users. It monitors RSS feeds to automatically download, sort, and rename new episodes of TV shows. It also supports automatic quality upgrades when better versions become available.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 通过监控和自动下载新剧集，实现电视剧的自动化管理
- 支持对已有剧集进行自动画质升级
- 确保媒体库的完整性与高质量维护

## 功能列表:

- 支持主流平台：Windows、Linux、macOS、Raspberry Pi 等
- 自动检测新剧集
- 可扫描现有媒体库并下载缺失的剧集
- 可监控已有剧集的更高画质版本并自动升级
- 自动处理下载失败的任务，尝试其他资源
- 支持手动搜索，可手动选择剧集或查看未自动下载的原因
- 完全可配置的剧集重命名规则
- 完全集成 SABnzbd 和 NZBGet
- 完全集成 Kodi、Plex（通知、媒体库更新、元数据）
- 完全支持特别篇和多集发布
- 拥有美观的用户界面
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Automates TV show management by monitoring and downloading new episodes
- Supports automatic quality upgrades for existing files
- Ensures comprehensive media library maintenance

## Features:

- Support for major platforms: Windows, Linux, macOS, Raspberry Pi, etc.
- Automatically detects new episodes
- Can scan your existing library and download any missing episodes
- Can watch for better quality of the episodes you already have and do an automatic upgrade
- Automatic failed download handling will try another release if one fails
- Manual search so you can pick any release or to see why a release was not downloaded automatically
- Fully configurable episode renaming
- Full integration with SABnzbd and NZBGet
- Full integration with Kodi, Plex (notification, library update, metadata)
- Full support for specials and multi-episode releases
- And a beautiful UI
